## Source: ossf-package-analysis (16b5f0da329be4724b85d6b7ee6052d4d02bc6cdb20345f3803842e329fa59ef)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'crypto-trade-analyzer' @ 2.0.1 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
